name: PerfAlert
description: A web service to trigger and compare Optimization snapshots after a successful Semaphore deploy

OPTIMIZATION_API_KEY.description: API key for your Rigor Optimization account

OPTIMIZATION_TEST_ID.description: ID of the Rigor Optimization test to trigger snapshots for

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack webhook URL to notify when a snapshot is triggered

SEMAPHORE_SERVER_REGEX.description: Optional regular expression used to match the deployed server from Semaphore
